name: Wicked Acolyte Chilam Sabak
text: If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. If this card is destroyed by battle: Special Summon this card from your Graveyard, but its ATK becomes 0, also, it becomes a Dark Tuner, and it cannot be used as a Synchro Material except for the Synchro Summon of a Dark Synchro monster.
